summary: We testified about federal payment processes and systems related to the General Fund, and our knowledge of audit activities over these systems. This testimony is based on our recurring audits of the General Fund. Treasury's Fiscal Service manages the General Fund systems that are critical to the government's financial infrastructure. For example, these systems disburse payments to American people and businesses; collect taxes and other...
title: Financial Management: Overview of Federal Payment Process
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
